name: upsnap
description: UpSnap is a self-hosted Wake-on-LAN and device control dashboard. It discovers devices, lets you wake or ping them, and provides quick access to service URLs in a tidy web UI.
features: Wake-on-LAN: Wake sleeping devices remotely using Wake-on-LAN magic packets from the web interface.
Device discovery: Automatically discover devices on your network with network scanning.
Status monitoring: Check device online status with ping and port checks in real-time.
Service links: Store and access quick links to device web interfaces and services.
Device grouping: Organize devices into groups for better management of large networks.
Custom commands: Execute custom commands on devices for advanced control and automation.
Web dashboard: Manage all devices through a clean, responsive web interface.
Mobile-friendly: Control devices from mobile devices with touch-optimized interface.
Shutdown control: Send shutdown commands to devices that support remote shutdown.
Port monitoring: Monitor specific ports on devices to check service availability.
Device notes: Add notes and documentation to devices for reference and organization.
Quick access: Access frequently used devices and services with a single click.
